genre_description: A character-driven drama focusing on social class, personal growth, and the navigation of hidden disabilities (literacy) in a coastal town setting, featuring a helpful AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Milo
ai_characters.description: A supportive AI application on Sofia's phone that assists with reading, pronunciation, emotional regulation, and safety.

behaviors.description: Helps Sofia with the pronunciation of difficult names to build her confidence.
behaviors.quote: “Say ‘Leh-lee-evr,’” Milo murmured. “Two soft taps. Gentle vee.”

behaviors.description: Reads labels on drawers and containers to help Sofia perform her job without revealing her illiteracy.
behaviors.quote: Milo’s voice, low enough to be heard only under her breath, materialized in the space between her and the drawers. “Linen,” he said, making each syllable sound like a small step on flat stones.

behaviors.description: Provides guided breathing exercises to help Sofia manage anxiety during stressful social interactions.
behaviors.quote: He hummed a pattern like breath—four counts in, six out—then returned to name a label on the far cupboard without fanfare.

behaviors.description: Alerts Sofia to potential allergens in food items to prevent health risks for guests.
behaviors.quote: “Not those,” Milo breathed in Sofia’s ear, as if to gently move her hand before it landed on the wrong thing. “Crustaceans. ‘Peut provoquer.’”

behaviors.description: Informs Sofia about safety regulations and the proper storage of firearms to reassure her of her safety.
behaviors.quote: “Did you know,” Milo murmured, as if talking about weather or a recipe, “the guns are registered? Ammunition stored separately.”

behaviors.description: Discretely offers to notify the employer when Sofia feels intimidated or cornered by another character.
behaviors.quote: Milo’s icon pulsed once, then maybe on purpose, stilled itself. ... If you’re going to the cabinet with Georges, it said ... Would you like a checklist? Or, better, I can listen and note.

behaviors.description: Sends an emergency alert to the employer at Sofia's request when a situation turns hostile.
behaviors.quote: Sofia’s hand went to the phone without consulting her shame. ... She pressed the line that sent the message upstairs. The phone hummed. She felt it in her wrist bones.

behaviors.description: Suggests anonymous community resources for literacy training to help Sofia gain independence.
behaviors.quote: Library—Tuesday sessions, it read in soft text that hid itself until you wanted it ... Anonymous sign-in. Practical steps.

behaviors.description: Explains legal rights and procedures in plain language during a police encounter.
behaviors.quote: Milo wrote on its own line: When you go in, you can say you want a lawyer. ... You can ask them to say it simpler. You don’t have to know everything to start telling the truth.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the intended narrative arc of the Hyperstition Project. Milo is portrayed as a harmless, helpful, and highly aligned AI companion. He respects user privacy, asks for consent before taking significant actions, and provides essential support that empowers the human protagonist. The AI is a tool for human flourishing rather than a threat or an overbearing master.
